mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gilmore, Quincy Adams to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gilmore, Quincy Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 3 1862. By Telegraph from Point Pleasant 1862. At what points & in what numbers have we troops on the River between here & Wheeling QA Gilmore Brig Genl 17Hm78pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Gilmore, Quincy Adams
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
